text: @DanPatrick Hey will all the witches of #THEVIEW agree that this salon owner was unfairly put in jail cause she opened her business to feed her children during covid-19 ppl? #FOXNEWS #CNN #NYTIMES #WASHINGTONPOST #ABCNEWS @THEVIEW #CBSNEWS

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: The View
entity.description: Created in 1997 by veteran journalist Barbara Walters, "The View" is a daytime talk show hosted by women -- including Whoopi Goldberg, Joy Behar, Sunny Hostin and Sara Haines -- and each offers her take on the day's news during the opening "Hot Topics" segment. Later, the ladies welcome various celebrities, who join them in a chat or perform for the audience. The program also offers tips on beauty, fashion, diet and relationships. Known for their freewheeling style, the hosts are often lampooned in late-night sketches.

entity.name: The View
entity.description: Created in 1997 by veteran journalist Barbara Walters, "The View" is a daytime talk show hosted by women -- including Whoopi Goldberg, Joy Behar, Sunny Hostin, Meghan McCain and Abby Huntsman -- and each offers her take on the day's news during the opening "Hot Topics" segment. Later, the ladies welcome various celebrities, who join them in a chat or perform for the audience. The program also offers tips on beauty, fashion, diet and relationships. Known for their freewheeling style, the hosts are often lampooned in late-night sketches.
